title: Is smartphone the greatest innovation by man? - Quora

response.answer_text: No it depends on your perspective , some people will agree who earn millions from social media , others might disagree Phones were meant to just call first it was developed this you can't call smartphone a innovation it is development , normal phone are innovation which was the first There are many innovations , from my point each and every has its equal pros and cons depending one the person you ask

Undoubtedly, smartphones are the great innovation by man but not the greatest. Because the purpose for which smartphones were created is not fulfilled by us. Smartphones are best innovation if used in right way. Hope satisfying!!!
